Package Catalano.Imaging.Tools

The Catalano.Imaging.Tools namespace contains collection classes, which provide different image moments, analysis textures.

See: Description

  • Class Summary

    Blob
    Blob object.
    BlobDetection
    Detects blobs.

Package Catalano.Imaging.Tools Description

The Catalano.Imaging.Tools namespace contains collection classes, which provide different image moments, analysis textures.
